name: Just Another Ludo
description:
Just Another Ludo #JAL is an exciting Ludo game with twists and turns at every round. A dice throw, for example, can lead your pawn to go ahead or backward. When a pawn is killed, the opponent will teleport to the destination rather than the home! Enter the #JAL #ludoverse right now!

How do users win? 

The winning conditions are marginally tweaked. The one reaching the destination first will be declared a winner. But it will take a lot of effort and luck to reach the end destination.
